event.title: October 2005 the three towns along with the town of Tatsuno merged

data.event: In October 2005 the three towns along with the town of Tatsuno merged into a single city bearing the name of Tatsuno.

event.title: 1931 - The town of Ikaruga was incorporated

data.event: 1931 - The town of Ikaruga was incorporated on present grounds of Taishi.

event.title: 1951 - The villages (mura) of Sekkai and Ōda were merged

data.event: 1951 - The villages (mura) of Sekkai and Ōda were merged with Ikaruga to form Taishi.

event.title: 1955 - The village of Tatsuda was incorporated

data.event: 1955 - The village of Tatsuda was incorporated into Taishi.
